JobFullDesc:
Kinesso brings together top talent in data, technology and media activation to deliver seamless data-driven marketing solutions. As a technology-enabler, Kinesso powers marketing systems through a proprietary suite of applications that seamlessly integrate ad tech and martech. Kinesso’s application framework spans audience, planning and activation, delivering insights and business outcomes for leading global brands.

We are looking for a talented individual who is incredibly passionate about data and analytics to lead a portfolio of reporting products. The individual shall have a proven track record of leading data and reporting products that transform raw data into organized information through business intelligence or data warehousing and visualizations. The VP of Product Management, Global Reporting  leads the product planning and execution throughout the product lifecycle, including: gathering and prioritizing product and customer requirements, defining the product vision, and working closely with engineering and support to ensure customer satisfaction goals are met. The role’s job also includes ensuring that the product supports the company’s overall strategy and goals, and is fit for use.

Job Responsibilities

·Define the product strategy and roadmap for Reporting products to deliver on the business goals

·Work closely with key stakeholders and users to define and prioritize product requirements

·Drive product requirements across the business to instrument data collection and ensure data quality, leading to critical customer-driven insights.

·Partner with leaders of the upstream data producing teams and downstream data consumers, to maximize productivity, alignment, and speed of execution.

·Manage teams responsible for the product vision, roadmap, product scenarios, user stories, and backlog for data product teams.

·Manage stakeholder expectations, set and communicate realistic timelines and deliverables.

·Lead customer requirements reviews, align acceptance & testing criteria, identify and respond to product issues.

·Lead strategic planning activities and operational improvement initiatives

·Assist in developing marketing and training materials, and be the subject matter expert to provide demos, education and training to drive adoption of the product

Desired Skills & Experience

·Expertise in product management, business intelligence, data analytics functions

·Experience advertising technologies or operations

·Deep product background in reporting products with a solid understanding of big data storage within cloud-based environments

·Subject matter expertise in the reporting and analytics landscape

·Proven track record of setting product development targets and delivering results a must, including experience authoring product requirements

·Excellent organizational skills; capacity to manage multiple priorities and tasks simultaneously and communicate with all levels of management

·Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority

·Excellent written and oral communication skills including presentation experience to large and diverse audiences

·Exceptionally self-motivated and directed

·Experience advocating and driving product adoption and usage

·Superior analytical, evaluative, and problem-solving abilities

·Aptitude for working with internal and external stakeholders to define requirements and quantify market opportunities - then driving them to realization

·Experience and/or strong desire to work in a high pressure, high demand entrepreneurial environment
